thread.title: Marshawn Lynch Takes Skittles to Scotland in Hilarious Super Bowl Ad
thread.title_full: Marshawn Lynch Takes Skittles to Scotland in Hilarious Super Bowl Ad

author: Jonathan Sawyer
title: Marshawn Lynch Takes Skittles to Scotland in Hilarious Super Bowl Ad
text:
In case you didn’t know, former NFL running back Marshawn Lynch has quite the affinity for Skittles . Accordingly, Beast Mode teamed up with his favorite candy brand to bring the tasty treat to the people of Houston, Scotland, as this year’s Super Bowl takes place in Houston, Texas on Sunday, February 5.
Unfortunately, we don’t see Marshawn rocking a kilt, but you will find him playing the bagpipes (sort of), wielding a sword and shield, and chopping it up with the locals who are actually pretty excited for Super Bowl LI.
So to see Lynch sharing his favorite candy with the people of Houston, Scotland, press play above.
And don’t forget, the New England Patriots take on the Atlanta Falcons on Sunday, February 5 for Super Bowl LI.
